properties.displayName: Hidden Powershell in Link File Pattern
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessCommandLine contains "powershell" and ProcessCommandLine contains ".lnk") and FolderPath =~ "C:\\Windows\\System32\\cmd.exe" and InitiatingProcessFolderPath =~ "C:\\Windows\\explorer.exe"

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects events that appear when a user click on a link file with a powershell command in
